SA22dipguhsu:848: jagati laghu sukhe 'dya vajrasattvapratisamaśāśvatatām gatā bhavantaḥ // 395
SA22dipguhsu:851: saty eva saṃbhave teṣāṃ pratyekaṃ vāmapāṇinā /
SA22dipguhsu:853: trisaptāhutim ekāṃ vā rājño vā bhūpater atha /
SA22dipguhsu:857: saṃgṛhya yat tad utsṛṣṭaṃ saṃtoṣya dattadakṣiṇān /
SA22dipguhsu:862: dattvārthine rajaḥ stokaṃ mahat toye rajaḥ sṛjet // 402
SA22dipguhsu:863: garttāpūre pratiṣṭhāyāṃ home cakre ca yad dhanam /
SA22dipguhsu:864: ācāryasyaiva tat sarvam ity āha varavajradhṛk // 403
SA22dipguhsu:868: tābhyāṃ yad racayec cakraṃ cittavākkāyikaṃ matam // 405
SA22dipguhsu:873: kāyastobhāc ca khesthānaṃ stobhāveśe vidhis tv ayam /
SA22dipguhsu:882: cetasaiva vidhiḥ sarvas taddhīno naiva sidhyati // 412
SA22dipguhsu:884: manasokto vidhiḥ śreṣṭho vāṅmātreṇātra kiṃ bhavet // 413
SA22dipguhsu:885: vṛttamātrān na buddhatvaṃ śrutamātrāc ca no bhavet /
SA22dipguhsu:886: cintayāpi na yāvac ca bhāvanāto nirucyate // 413
SA22dipguhsu:891: yat phalaṃ bodhicittaṃ tad buddhajñānam anuttaram /
